report.title: Smoking Mushrooms Works
report.author: Daytrippr
report.bodytext: 2 reports for the price of one! /n /n Around October of 2000, some friends and i were going to have /n a typical smoke session. Maybe 5 people, some high quality /n weed. Well, i had a bunch of mushroom shake left from a party, /n and i threw it on top. Why not? I had to work in an hour and /n a half and figured the weed would be fading by then. /n So we toked it all down. Pretty soon i felt totally stoned /n out of my gourd. And more, it had the definate feel of mushrooms /n too. Great i thought, its really nice. But by the time work /n rolled around, i was still feeling like dancing through happy /n land. I had to call in with a lame excuse. /n /n Now, Aughust 2001, im sitting in japan (mushrooms are legal /n here by the way). I just packed a bowl full of mushroom shake /n and burnt down. Well, its definately giving some effects. Mild /n visual changes, sound and tactile perceptions are slightly mushroomy. Nice feeling. /n /n So, i can say mushroom smoking has an effect. However, the taste is rather bad, and usually causes a mild headache. Definately interesting though. If you have only 1 or 2 caps, or a bunch of shake, id say smoke the stuff, but use some weed to kill the taste.
